thread.title: Family fears for safety of missing Edson man

author: Jennifer Ivanov
title: Family fears for safety of missing Edson man
text:
February 19, 2017 9:49 pm Family fears for safety of missing Edson man 
Tyrone Kellerman was last seen on Feb. 13, 2017. RCMP What is this?

The family of a missing 56-year old Edson man have turned to the public for help locating him. 
Tyrone Kellerman was last seen on Monday, February 13 at the Walmart in Edson around 10 a.m. 
Tyrone Kellerman was last seen at the Edson Walmart on Feb. 13, 2017. RCMP 
According to RCMP, Kellerman may be driving a dark blue Dodge Ram Diesel truck with Alberta plate BFT-8284. 
Kellerman is described as:
